entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 3:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: SE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
